content: विक्रमः {@--1@} A step, stride, pace; गतेषु लीलांचितविक्रमेषु <ls>Ku. 1. 34</ls>; <ls>Ś. 7. 6</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> त्रिविक्रम. {@--2@} Stepping over, walking. {@--3@} Overcoming, overpowering. {@--4@} Heroism, prowess, heroic valour; अनुत्सेकः खलु विक्रमालंकारः <ls>V. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 87</ls>, <ls n="R. 12.">93.</ls> {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a celebrated king of Ujjayinī; see App. II. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. {@--7@} Strength, power.
